relation: Its definitely not a home cooked meal.
99% of the teachers i had were very helpful and fair but they flowered strict guide lines.
If a good transition between high school and university life is what your looking for then JCC is a great place to start. Helpful teachers and faculty make the experience smooth and less stressful.
pageTitle: Jackson College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {150558=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 13292=my classes arent hard yet i just started in may so its like july now im not studying for my major until fall., 50285=The price for classes themselves are not bad, the credit hour cost as of 2012 is 100.50 bucks for in state students. The bookstore however is a complete rip-off, if possible buy your books online.}

textAfterTable: JCC is great for education. Many of the professors could easily be university professors, and it is because of that that JCC is so helpful. Because of the size of JCC, one can get help much easier which, in turn, will help the individual to learn more. Login to rate or flag the reviews April from Pleasant Lake, MI 12/07/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 2 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 40 Categories Comments Bang for the buck I plan to go through financial aid Will enjoy being here Yes, because it is close to home.
